item.title: LC contest problems summary
item.description: Biweekly-66 (27th Nov, 2021) 2085. Count Common Words With One Occurrence Hint 1 Use hashmap (Counter) 2086. Minimum Number of Buckets Required to Collect Rainwater from Houses" Hint 1 First put the bucket at best place and the remove those covering home. Hint 2 Answer is (best bucket cnt + remaining house). Hint 3 Corner case: check for each house is coverable

item.title: Hugo commands
item.description: run local server hugo server -D Hugo build/export the site hugo -d ../becoming-the-unbeatable relative imports example: static\icons\favicon.png relative imports: icons\favicon.png fix for label image icon: /becoming-the-unbeatable/small_icon.jpg instead of icon: small_icon.png github issue: https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod/issues/622
